pullrequest.title: fix a bug in Actor.cc when using ActorPlugin where the collision remains at the origin

content.raw:
Thank you for the fix! This works for me! I checked that it doesn't adversely affect scripted actors, and fixes actors with custom trajectories. Here's an example of a before and after using `ActorCollisionsPlugin` for one of the actors in `cafe.world`:

## Before, collisions show but are not really there

![actor_traj_no_collision_opt.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2819751335-actor_traj_no_collision_opt.gif)

## With this PR, collisions actually move with the actor

![actor_traj_collision_opt.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/645441980-actor_traj_collision_opt.gif)
